    • Method Detail

      • calculateSystem

        public void calculateSystem(double canvaswidth,
                            double canvasheight)
        Parameters:
        canvaswidth - width of canvas for checking outside of arena
        canvasheight - height of canvas for checking outside of arena

      • collisionline

        public void collisionline(Robot r,
                          Robot s,
                          double reflectionaxis)
        Draws the line upon which two robots collide.
        Parameters:
        r - Robot R
        s - Robot S
        reflectionaxis - The angle at which they collide, and at which the line should be drawn

      • drawInfo

        public void drawInfo(double mousex,
                     double mousey)
        Writes the information of all robots in the arena to Debug
        Parameters:
        mousex - Current mouse x, in relation to the Window
        mousey - Current mouse y, in relation to the Window

      • drawSystem

        public void drawSystem()
        Display the System The canvas is cleared. Lights are sent to the start of the array so they are drawn first, which stops robots hiding behind them. Next each robot is drawn.

      • addRobot

        public void addRobot(int type,
                     double... data)
        Overload for AddRobot to take infinite parameters
        Parameters:
        type - robot type
        data - array of data, written as individual doubles separated by commas

      • addRobotArray

        public void addRobotArray(int type,
                          double[] data)
        Main function for AddRobot, as a Double[] so data can be parsed in a different format.
        Parameters:
        type - robot type
        data - array of data.
